Jadi yg mau nginap di hotel grand mercure siap2 aja bawa extra towel sendiri apalagi kalo yg nginap lebih dari 2 orang dan bawa anak2, dan jangan lupa bawa air mineral sendiri yg banyak. 
Translated: Beginning until the hotel wants to check in there is no one in front to offer trolly, must ask for help first and then the people come. Bath towel also asks for extra 1 for children not to be given. For the size of a 5 -star hotel, just a stingy problem. Even though the room price is fairly cheap. This is the first time I stayed at a 5 star hotel but just asking for extra towel to be given. Then mineral water in a hotel room is also only provided 2pcs 300ml. So those who want to stay at the Grand Mercure Hotel are ready to bring their own extra towels especially if those who stay more than 2 people and bring children, and don't forget to bring your own mineral water.
